insights.title: Outperforming on Content Depth
insights.description: Your average content length is 2.3x competitor average, signaling expertise to AI.

insights.title: Growing Market Share
insights.description: Your share of AI mentions increased from 18% to 24% over 3 months.

insights.title: Competitor A Dominates AI Responses
insights.description: Competitor A appears in 78% of AI responses vs your 45%. Significant gap exists.

issues.message: AI Response Gap vs Competitor A (45% vs 78%)
issues.impact: Losing significant brand discovery opportunities to market leader
Lower trust signals compared to top 3 competitors
Competitors publish 3x more content monthly, capturing more AI training data

recommendations.title: Competitive Gap Analysis
recommendations.action: Identify and create content for 25 high-value keywords where competitors rank but you don't.

recommendations.title: Strategic Link Building
recommendations.action: Launch outreach campaign targeting competitor backlink sources.

recommendations.title: Increase Content Velocity
recommendations.action: Scale content production to match industry publishing standards.
